frontmatter.title: The Road to Godot Part 2: Which version of Godot is the Best?
frontmatter.description: One of the most frequently asked questions asked on the Godot forums is which Godot version is the Best right now? This is not a trivial question to answer. There are multiple actively maintained and developed branches with different strengths and tradeoffs available. Read on for our recommendations.
